To address the requirements of stopping the email sends once a subscriber has made a purchase and providing reporting on the success of the campaign, Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) should use:
• B. Goals
In Journey Builder, Goals allow you to define specific objectives for your journey, such as making a purchase. Once a subscriber meets the goal (e.g., makes a purchase at the NTO outlet), they can be automatically removed from the journey, stopping any further emails from being sent to them. Additionally, Goals provide reporting on how well the journey is performing in terms of achieving the defined objectives, helping you measure the success of the campaign.

To send a personalized email that includes details about loyalty members' profiles, point balance, and purchase behavior, which exist across several data extensions in Marketing Cloud, a marketer should use:
• C. AMPscript Search Functions
AMPscript is a powerful scripting language in Marketing Cloud that allows you to retrieve and manipulate data from multiple data extensions. By using AMPscript Search Functions, you can dynamically pull in personalized data for each loyalty program member and include it in the email content. This approach provides the flexibility needed to access and display complex data from various sources within the email.

Selected Answer: C
Enhanced dynamic content is a spreadsheet with links to personalization content but cannot pull attribute values from various DE. So, AmpScript search function is needed to pull the attribute values from various DE.
